title: English Conversation Practice Program for Professionals Using 3D Virtual Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English conversation skills (intermediate level) and fundamental smartphone operation proficiency
context.additional_context: Teaching Competency Enhancement Program for Pre-Service/In-Service Teachers: Small-Scale English Conversation Programs in Smartphone-Centric Limited-Technology Environments, Focusing on Practical Language Skills Through Collaborative Activities

learning_goals: Learners enhance their ability to engage in continuous English conversations with peer learners and virtual avatars for at least 10 minutes in a 3D virtual environment.
Learners achieve 80%+ accuracy and fluency in scenario-based conversations related to professional fields (medical/legal/technical).
Learners set at least one pronunciation/expression improvement goal weekly through formative assessments (dialogue recording analysis) in virtual environments.

resources: Low-spec mobile device-compatible voice chat system
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
